title: Policy Iteration

definitions.Policy Iteration: A method used in reinforcement learning to find the optimal policy by iteratively evaluating and improving a policy.

formulas: V^π_i(s) = Σ T(s, π_i(s), s') [R(s, π_i(s), s') + γV^π_i(s')]
π_i+1(s) = arg max_a Σ T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV^π_i(s')]
summary: The slide discusses Policy Iteration in reinforcement learning, detailing the evaluation and improvement steps. It includes formulas for calculating the value function and policy updates.
